testsuite.name: com.gaelcraves.project3.GaelCravings_Backend.UserServiceTest

testcase.name: Should return true when security answer matches
Should return user when found by email
Should throw exception when user not found for security answer verification
Should throw exception when password is null
Should return empty when user not found
Should return all users
Should throw exception when email already exists
Should throw exception when resetting password for non-existent user
Should return false when security answer doesn't match
Should return empty when user not found by email
Should return empty list when no users exist
Should return user when email and password match
Should throw exception when password is too short
Should throw exception when new password is null
Should create user with hashed password and security answer
Should delete user when user exists
Should return user when found by ID
Should throw exception when new password is too short
Should return empty when password doesn't match
Should return empty when user not found by ID
Should reset password with valid input
Should throw exception when deleting non-existent user
